name: cypress_cucumber_framework
description: End-to-end Test Framework with Cypress and Cucumber is developed by Quynh Le

scripts.pretest: rimraf allure-results/* && rimraf allure-report/* && rimraf cypress/screenshots && mkdir cypress/screenshots
scripts.test: npm run pretest && npm run cy:run
scripts.po: npm run pretest && npx cypress-tags run -e TAGS="@po" --env allure=true
scripts.gr: npm run pretest && npx cypress-tags run -e TAGS="@gr" --env allure=true
scripts.pr: npm run pretest && npx cypress-tags run -e TAGS="@pr" --env allure=true
